review1.author: Alina, 29 years old
review1.text: Very grateful for the consultations. Everything was detailed, with examples and recommendations. I feel improvements in a week! Very grateful for the consultations. Everything was detailed, with examples and recommendations. I feel improvements in a week!

review2.author: Maria, 34 years old
review2.text: I received a clear recovery plan, the doctor answered all my questions. The service was top notch!

review3.author: Irina, 41 years old
review3.text: Very attentive attitude. It was nice to work with the doctor, you can feel the experience and care.

review4.author: Elena, 26 years old
review4.text: Honestly, I didn't expect such a level of professionalism online. Everything is super!

review5.author: Tatyana, 38 years old
review5.text: Thank you very much for the recommendations. I already feel much better.
